title: (x) Some jersey numbers - Franklin Gothic {Mark S}
content:
I'm having trouble matching this to anything I have. It looks so generic.   
   
 ![FPS numbers](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020194930im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/23614.jpg)   
   
Close matches would be good if an exact match isn't found.
author: cph

comments.content: [Franklin Extra Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020194930/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/franklin-gothic/extra-condensed/testdrive.html?s=2401783956&p=72) with an outline treatment added.
Dammit. That one wasn't installed. I went through all the workhorses I have... I wasted too much time on such an easy id ;-)
